name: Zentiva Group, a.s.
membership: Zentiva Group is member of Medicines for Europe.
goal: With more than 2,500 people across Europe and 2 production sites in Prague and Bucharest Zentiva strives to be the champion of Generics and OTC medicines to better support people’s daily healthcare needs. We are using innovation and adapted business models all over the world to make affordable, high quality generic medicines available to patients.
euInitiatives: Any and all initiatives and projects currently followed and discussed by and at Medicines for Europe.
